attributes.action: Public hanging for religious and racially motivated murder
attributes.additional_details:
Public hanging to be reintroduced for religious and racially motivated murder.

This should only be subject to cases where beyond no reasonable doubt that any such murder was an act of or portrayed to be an act of religious or racial beliefs.

Please sign this petition aimed solely at but not limited to the incident were two attackers butchered a said to be British soldier in a daylight attack in London, this case raised fears that terrorism had once again returned to the capital.

This kind of behaviour should not be tolorated by the british government or the people they govern, there can be no greater statement made by the people for that of a public hanging for any such crime regardless of ethnicity that says "we will not be bullied or intimidated by such acts and by no means will this be tolerated in our lands".

We welcome people of hardship & suffering from all backgrounds and religion with open arms, our people, our country and its laws deserves respect and loyalty.
